sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-main class="bg-grey-lighten-3">
    <v-container>
      <transition-group name="posts-list">
        <post-card
            :title="post.title"

            :description="post.description"

            :main-content="post.mainContent"
        />
      </transition-group>
    </v-container>
  </v-main>






</template>

<script>
import {mapActions, mapGetters} from "vuex";
import PostCard from "@/components/PostCard.vue";


 export default {
   components:{PostCard},
  mounted() {
    this.fetchPost($route.params.id);

  },
  computed:{
    ...mapGetters({
      post:'post',
    }),
  },
  methods:{
    ...mapActions({
      fetchPost:'fetchPost',
    }),
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
